zh.tips: 简介生成器提供给 B站直播间生成简介使用，具有可视化修改功能。

statement.msg_1: 从blive开始一人前行到现在众多贡献用户相伴，少不了他们的帮助，blive到现在还处于维护需感谢他们。
statement.msg_2: 少数愿无偿帮助blive可爱的人们(●'◡'●) —— 致敬

table.name: 用户/昵称
table.contactText: 太害羞了，所以不愿意公布
table.footer: 以上名单不分前后顺序

en.tips: The introduction generator is provided to generate introductions in the live broadcast room of station B, and has a visual modification function.

statement.msg_1: From the beginning of blive to the present, many contributing users are accompanied by their help, and blive is still under maintenance and we need to thank them.
statement.msg_2: A small number of people who are willing to help blive's lovely people free of charge (●'◡'●)-tribute

table.name: name
table.contactText: Too shy, so I don’t want to announce
table.footer: The above list is in no particular order
